statements: SELECT * FROM rental_locations;
SELECT address, operating_hours FROM rental_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, address FROM rental_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_locations WHERE operating_hours LIKE '%am%';
SELECT MAX(location_id) AS max_location_id FROM rental_locations;
SELECT location_id, address, contact_number, operating_hours FROM rental_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM rental_locations WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT location_id, address FROM rental_locations WHERE operating_hours LIKE '%9AM%';
SELECT * FROM rental_locations ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT MAX(location_id) AS max_location_id, MIN(location_id) AS min_location_id FROM rental_locations;

SELECT item_name, quantity FROM rental_inventory WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY item_name DESC;

SELECT * FROM rental_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;

SELECT location_id, item_name, quantity FROM rental_inventory JOIN rental_locations ON rental_inventory.location_id = rental_locations.location_id WHERE rental_locations.address LIKE 'Downtown%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
